## Summary

A short description of the feature or improvement.

## Motivation

Why is this useful? (e.g. training stability, inference speed, usability.)

What you’d like to add or change (API, CLI, config, docs, etc.).

## Alternatives

Any alternative designs or options you’ve considered.

## Additional context

Links, references, or examples that might help.
